rooms.description: Traditional entrance courtyard, ensuring Vastu guidelines for prosperity.
Central open space, essential in Nalukettu design, surrounded by other rooms to maintain air circulation and natural light.
Living area on the north-east corner for positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.
North-west pantry, following Vastu for food and storage areas.
South-east bedroom area for the eldest in family, ensuring privacy and respect as per traditional norms.
South-west master bedroom following Vastu principles to ensure stability and wealth.
West-facing gym, wheelchair accessible with proper entry from the central courtyard for easy access.

openings.location: South side of Padippura, overlooking the courtyard

openings.description: East-facing swimming pool area with deck and safety rails for wheelchair accessibility.
